commands.command: ALTER TABLE PriceLevelsTbl ADD CONSTRAINT UIT_PriceLevelDesc UNIQUE (PriceLevelDesc)
INSERT INTO PriceLevelsTbl (PriceLevelDesc,PricingFactor,Enabled,Notes) VALUES ('Standard',1,1,'no chage in price or acccount price')
INSERT INTO PriceLevelsTbl (PriceLevelDesc,PricingFactor,Enabled,Notes) VALUES ('Dealer',0.9,1,'Discount for dealers')
INSERT INTO PriceLevelsTbl (PriceLevelDesc,PricingFactor,Enabled,Notes) VALUES ('Host',0.7,1,'Discount for a host/landlord')
INSERT INTO PriceLevelsTbl (PriceLevelDesc,PricingFactor,Enabled,Notes) VALUES ('RemoteAgent',0.85,1,'Remote agetns do not get com we give them a discount')
